quotes.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: Risk comes from not knowing what you're doing.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.text: The reasonable man adapts himself to the world; the unreasonable one persists in trying to adapt the world to himself. Therefore all progress depends on the unreasonable man.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Ships in harbor are safe, but that's not what ships are built for.
quotes.author: John A. Shedd

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Wind extinguishes a candle and energizes fire. Likewise with randomness, uncertainty, chaos: you want to use them, not hide from them.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.text: It is not the strongest of the species that survives, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.text: The secret of freedom lies in educating people, whereas the secret of tyranny is in keeping them ignorant.
quotes.author: Maximilien Robespierre

quotes.text: Compound interest is the eighth wonder of the world. He who understands it, earns it; he who doesn't, pays it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The impediment to action advances action. What stands in the way becomes the way.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius
